channel.title: Catalogue of Ships
channel.itunes:author: Michael Kraskin and David Terry
channel.description: Sometimes funny, sometimes sad, always offbeat and refreshing in this quirky, thought provoking weekly podcast. Stories told by David Terry, re-mixed and scored by composer/sound designer Michael Kraskin, posted Monday mornings and listened to by you.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Life catalogued. Then re-mixed.
channel.itunes:summary: Sometimes funny, sometimes sad, always offbeat and refreshing in this quirky, thought provoking weekly podcast. Stories told by David Terry, re-mixed and scored by composer/sound designer Michael Kraskin, posted Monday mornings and listened to by you.

item.itunes:author: David Terry and Michael Kraskin
item.itunes:subtitle: He has no time.
